trends: There have been no other sightings in Bootle
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on the bus on the way home from university at approximatly 4pm, passing through bootle. i was looking out the window when something caught my eye. i looked up and saw what appeared to be a dark disc shaped object in the sky. a few seconds later another 3 objects appeared, the same as the first. they were all moving in different directions and then stopped and hovered. they appeared to be black on the base. the objects appeared to be spinning. i lost sight of them as the bus i was on continued along its journey. the experience was quite mesmorising, and i only wish i would have been able to recordv the event.
